title: column_cat
description: Catenate files horizontally. Each line of output is the concatenation of each current line from the input files, all on the same line, separated by a space or a user-defined separator.

line_number.title: Line number
line_number.description: Print only the specified line number (1-based)

separator_string.title: Separator string
separator_string.description: Use the specified string as a separator between columns
